Reviews.Title: Works great except for the touch screen
Reviews.Author: Free Spirit
Reviews.Content: I bought this model computer from Dell in May 2013.  I have had to call on issues with installation of software (original to the computer) and issues with the touch screen.  My most recent contact was February 28, 2014.  The service tech went through the software and reinstalled drivers and the touch screen was back in business.  However the touch screen quit working about 6 hours later.  I will be on the phone with Dell to request help with the touch screen.

Reviews.Title: Like it fine...
Reviews.Author: Tery Bodette
Reviews.Content: We are enjoying the ease of being able to access many programs at the touch of a finger or mouse...however,  DO NOT care for the ease at will of the menu bar sliding onto screen randomly stopping whatever your doing at the moment.All in all...it has been an exciting experience learning and using the new windows 8.1 program.

Reviews.Title: you will love the touch experience with this laptop..
Reviews.Author: virendra yadav
Reviews.Content: Awesome in terms of touch effect.. Worth of money. Thanks Amazon and Dell. I like its speed of operation as well. keyboard can be a little better...

Reviews.Title: Good price, product, fullfilment.
Reviews.Author: joe melendez
Reviews.Content: I dont have any bad thing to say about my purchase, laptop works great, windows 8 run fast and  my design software just fly!Just deliver to latin america and it will be flawless!

Reviews.Title: Dell needs to up their customer support!
Reviews.Author: Ramona Bigelow
Reviews.Content: I am so sorry I bought another Dell. This is my third Dell and it is because of the horrid tech support at Dell that I considered something else.  It ran extremely slow and was mostly non-responsive. My IT person said it needed to catch up on updates. So I did all updates and after 2 weeks I get a blue screen saying it needed recovery repair.  I have been waiting for over a week to get a disc to do the repair.  They have sent it 3 times supposedly but still no disc.Maybe Amazon can give me a contact name in this country because I am dealing with India and they are useless!E

Reviews.Title: Deel Inspiron
Reviews.Author: Beatriz Smdt
Reviews.Content: I really liked the computador! My expectations have been fully met. The Dell inspiron turns fast and the touch works seamlessly.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5-4200U Processor 1.6 GHz
6 GB DDR3L SDRAM
500 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Touch Screen
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron 15.6-Inch Touchscreen Laptop (i15RVT-13333BLK)
